mapper.select: select tem.name,count(1) cc from(select (case when o.graduation < SYSDATE() then '毕业学生' else '在校学生' end) name from sys_user u left join sys_student_expansion o on u.id=o.user_id where and EXISTS ( select 1 from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role sr on ur.role_id=sr.id where ur.user_id=u.id and sr.biz_type='1' and sr.del_flag='0' ) and u.del_flag='0' )tem group by tem.name

SELECT tem.name, count(1) cc FROM ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET('1', o.teacherType) AND FIND_IN_SET('2', o.teacherType) THEN '双导' ELSE CASE WHEN FIND_IN_SET('1', o.teacherType) THEN '校内导师' ELSE '企业导师' END END ) name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_teacher_expansion o ON u.id = o.user_id WHERE and EXISTS ( select 1 from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role sr on ur.role_id=sr.id where ur.user_id=u.id and sr.biz_type='2' and sr.del_flag='0' ) AND u.del_flag = '0' AND o.teacherType IS NOT NULL ) tem GROUP BY tem. NAME

select tem.label,tem.name,count(1) cc from (select (case when tu.user_type='1' then '学生' else '导师' end) label,date_format(t.apply_time,'%Y') name from project_declare t left join team_user_relation tu on t.team_id=tu.team_id and tu.state='0' where t.status!='0' and t.del_flag='0' )tem group by tem.label,tem.name order by tem.name

select d.label, count(*) as num from pro_model t LEFT JOIN act_yw a on a.id=t.actyw_id LEFT JOIN pro_project p on p.id=a.rel_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d on d.value=p.type where d.type='competition_type' and t.del_flag='0' and d.del_flag='0' and p.pro_type='7,' and t.sub_time is not null group by d.label UNION select d.label, count(*) as num from g_contest t LEFT JOIN act_yw a on a.id=t.actyw_id LEFT JOIN pro_project p on p.id=a.rel_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d on d.value=p.type where d.type='competition_type' and t.del_flag='0' and d.del_flag='0' and t.sub_time is not null group by d.label

select d.label, count(*) as num from pro_model t LEFT JOIN act_yw a on a.id=t.actyw_id LEFT JOIN pro_project p on p.id=a.rel_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d on d.value=p.type where d.type='project_style' and t.del_flag='0' and d.del_flag='0' and p.pro_type='1,' and p.del_flag='0' and t.sub_time is not null group by d.label UNION select d.label, count(*) as num from project_declare t LEFT JOIN act_yw a on a.id=t.actyw_id LEFT JOIN pro_project p on p.id=a.rel_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d on d.value=p.type where d.type='project_style' and t.del_flag='0' and d.del_flag='0' and p.del_flag='0' and t.apply_time is not null group by d.label

select d.label,ste.teacherType,count(*) as num from sys_teacher_expansion ste INNER JOIN ( select * from ( SELECT p.name,t.user_id,t.team_id,t.user_type FROM project_declare p LEFT JOIN team_user_relation t ON p.team_id=t.team_id WHERE p.`status`!='0' and t.user_type='2' AND p.del_flag='0' and t.state='0' and p.actyw_id is not null union ALL SELECT g.p_name,t.user_id,t.team_id,t.user_type FROM g_contest g LEFT JOIN team_user_relation t ON g.team_id=t.team_id WHERE g.audit_state!='0' and t.user_type='2' AND g.del_flag='0' and t.state='0' and g.actyw_id is not null and (t.state='0' or t.state='4') union ALL select pm.p_name,t.user_id,t.team_id,t.user_type from pro_model pm LEFT JOIN team_user_relation t ON pm.team_id=t.team_id LEFT JOIN act_yw a on a.id=pm.actyw_id where pm.del_flag='0' and t.user_type='2' and pm.sub_status='1' and pm.actyw_id is not null and (t.state='0' or t.state='4') )m GROUP BY m.user_id )pt on pt.user_id=ste.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d on d.value=ste.teacherType where d.type='master_type' and d.del_flag='0' GROUP BY ste.teacherType

select d.label from sys_dict d inner JOIN pro_project p on d.value=p.type where d.type='project_style' and p.del_flag='0' and p.type is not null and p.pro_type='1,' and d.del_flag='0' UNION select d.label from sys_dict d inner JOIN pro_project p on d.value=p.type where d.type='competition_type' and p.del_flag='0' and p.type is not null and p.pro_type='7,' and d.del_flag='0'

select * from ( select SUBSTRING(pd.apply_time,1,4) year from project_declare pd LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pd.actyw_id where pd.apply_time is not null and pd.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null UNION select SUBSTRING(pm.sub_time,1,4) year from pro_model pm LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=pm.actyw_id where pm.sub_time is not null and pm.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null UNION select SUBSTRING(g.sub_time,1,4) year from g_contest g LEFT join act_yw ay on ay.id=g.actyw_id where g.sub_time is not null and g.del_flag='0' and ay.rel_id is not null ) m group by year ORDER by year

select t.likes,t.name from sys_user t where t.likes is not null and t.likes !=0 and EXISTS ( select 1 from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role sr on ur.role_id=sr.id where ur.user_id=t.id and sr.biz_type='2' and sr.del_flag='0' ) ORDER BY t.likes desc
